name: The Lone Blade (itch)
description:
The Lone Blade is a 3D platformer where you play as a sword.

«Punished by the gods, the greedy one was locked up in the blade, his ascent will be his redemption»

-FREE DEMO AVALAIBLE-

Please do give us feedback by filling up this form!

We recommend using a controller when playing the game altough keypad + mouse is kinda supported.

Controls Ps4 / Xbox / Keyboard :

Jump : X / A / Spacebar

Tilt forward : Stick up / W

Tilt Backward : Stick Down / S

Side rotations : Stick L or R / A or D

Dash : O / B / Left shift

Drop : ☐ / X / E
